profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.11 Fonts - 6.2.11.6 Character encodings - Non-symbolic TrueType fonts
profile.description: No non-symbolic TrueType font shall define a Differences array unless all of the glyph names in the Differences array are listed in the Adobe Glyph List and the embedded font program contains at least the Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1) encoding in the "cmap" table.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: No non-symbolic TrueType font shall define a Differences array unless all of the glyph names in the Differences array are listed in the Adobe Glyph List and the embedded font program contains at least the Microsoft Unicode (3,1 – Platform ID=3, Encoding ID=1) encoding in the "cmap" table.

error.message: A non-symbolic TrueType font has encoding different from MacRomanEncoding or WinAnsiEncoding, or the glyphs in the Differences array can not be mapped to the embedded font glyphs via the Adobe Glyph List
